Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Spells your opponents cast that target this creature cost {2} more to cast.
[b]Warrior[/b] | Spells you cast that target this creature cost {2} less to cast.
